channel.title: Ascaria - Looking for interested content developers! (Server)
channel.description:
[center]Do [b]YOU[/b] have what it takes to be a [i]content developer[/i]? Well, this could be your chance!
Ascaria, a 2006 custom economy server, is currently looking for interested members to join the content development team.
[I]There are some requirements for joining the content development team:[/I]
[ul][size=12pt][*]Fluent in the English language [*]Past experience with content developing (recommended) [*]Large understanding of how to add content to the server [*]Large understanding of java [*]Respect and dedication [*]Hard-Working[/ul]
[/size] [I]If you meet these requirements and interested, please contact me (owner of Ascaria) via Skype. My Skype username is [b]jon.niemiec[/b] and I am usually always online![/I]
[SPOILER=Three Latest Content Development]
[ul][*]Invasion Minigame (Custom-Made) - See photo below for sneak-peak [*]Added FunPK! [*]Added Custom Quests/Miniquests - See photo below for sneak-peak[/ul] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Photos of Latest Content Development] Invasion Minigame: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fEsb2gP.png[/img]
FunPK: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zmS9MjX.png[/img]
Custom Quests/Miniquests [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4NP3m3x.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Current Staff Team][u]Current Staff:[/u] Owner: Mod Jon Co-Owner: Mod Four Lead Content Developer: Mod Austin Content Developer: Mod Four Web Developer: Mod Osiris[/center][/SPOILER]

item.title: Ascaria - Looking for interested content developers! (Server)
item.dc:creator: @Ascaria Ascaria
item.description:
@Ascaria wrote:

[center]Do YOU have what it takes to be a content developer?
Well, this could be your chance!

Ascaria, a 2006 custom economy server, is currently looking for interested members to join the content development team.

[I]There are some requirements for joining the content development team:[/I]

[ul][size=12pt][]Fluent in the English language
[]Past experience with content developing (recommended)
[]Large understanding of how to add content to the server
[]Large understanding of java
[]Respect and dedication
[]Hard-Working[/ul]

[/size]
[I]If you meet these requirements and interested, please contact me (owner of Ascaria) via Skype. My Skype username is jon.niemiec and I am usually always online![/I]
